Container.Name: academic-time-tracker
Container.Overview: Academic Time Tracker - A productivity application for students and academics to track time spent on tasks and projects, with visualization tools and academic period management.
Container.Description:
Academic Time Tracker - A productivity application for students and academics to track time spent on tasks and projects, with visualization tools and academic period management.
Features: - Time tracking with session notes - Task organization by groups/projects - Time distribution visualization - Academic period management - Database backup/restore - CSV data export
Note: This container serves the backend API. You'll need to run the Python frontend locally to interact with it.
